properties.name: Defaults
properties.help: Space-separated 'name=value' pairs for common argument defaults.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: SearchQuery
properties.help: Query text to find.

properties.name: Reindex
properties.help: Clear the current index and reindex the command modules.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Style
properties.help: The colors of the shell.

properties.name: Update
properties.help: Update the Interactive extension to the latest available.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: AllowNoSubscriptions
properties.help: Support access tenants without subscriptions. It's uncommon but useful to run tenant level commands, such as 'az ad'.

properties.name: Password
properties.help: Credentials like user password, or for a service principal, provide client secret or a pem file with key and public certificate. Will prompt if not given.

properties.name: ServicePrincipal
properties.help: The credential representing a service principal.

properties.name: Tenant
properties.help: The AAD tenant, must provide when using service principals.

properties.name: UseCertSnIssuer
properties.help: Used with a service principal configured with Subject Name and Issuer Authentication in order to support automatic certificate rolls.

properties.name: UseDeviceCode
properties.help: Use CLI's old authentication flow based on device code. CLI will also use this if it can't launch a browser in your behalf, e.g. in remote SSH or Cloud Shell.

properties.name: Username
properties.help: User name, service principal, or managed service identity ID.

properties.name: Identity
properties.help: Log in using the Virtual Machine's identity.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Username
properties.help: Account user, if missing, logout the current active account.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

commonTaskProperties.name: Debug
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity to show all debug logs.

commonTaskProperties.name: Help
commonTaskProperties.help: Show this help message and exit.

commonTaskProperties.name: Query
commonTaskProperties.help: JMESPath query string. See http://jmespath.org/ for more information and examples.

commonTaskProperties.name: Verbose
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity. Use --debug for full debug logs.
